reviewText: Gotta agree with the previous two posters. Where's the DVD for this movie?? All of Chuck's movies are out on DVD except this one. What are you waiting for? The movie gets 5 stars from me but the waiting gets .000000000001. Ridiculous. And then you get greedy people on here who charge $123 for a DVD.

reviewText: really love this movie but fancy having to pay this much just for a DVD.went on eBay and searched chuck Norris found it,paid $33.00 australian currency with delivery.what is this expensive copy made of...GOLD?

reviewText: Im a big time movie collector..when I say big time I mean I have well over 3000 dvds shelved & just covering every inch of a bedroom in my home. This movie was one of those titles that takes me back to my childhood. Now I havent seen this since then but from what I can remember this was a really good movie. But lets be honest here.. with this item being rare and out of print. still makes the asking price insane!! You can buy a diffrent region dvd player an the movie of that region for far less..and even tho I wouldnt do this(from a collectors stand point) if u had to have this movie that bad, their r ways to track it down an get it burned for u aslong as u know someone who does that type of thing for no more than 5 dollers!!...save your money and time..almost all movies get re-released at some point..the movie gets 4 stars, the people that think they can take us for all were worth...u get a laugh outta me for thinking were that stupied!
Title: N/A

reviewText: As with many others, I enjoyed this movie on VHS tape (years and years ago).  Why, oh why do we have to (a)Wait for this movie to appear on Region 1 DVD and (b)Pay a ridiculous price for it?  As far as I'm concerned, someone out there is trying to hang us upside down and shake the money from our pockets.  I hope they realize that it is a down market out there (for everything!).  They (whoever they may be) are shooting themselves in the foot!  There is no profit in trying to 'gouge' the public at this time in our economic history.  Four stars for the movie, and 'zero' stars for whoever is keeping the DVD from us!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I just bought Sidekicks from Amazon Germany. It is a Region 2. Cost me about $20. I own a Region free DVD player-you can buy one from Amazon for about $50. I have also bought the TV series "Two Guys, a Girl, and a Pizza Place from Amazon UK. I can't believe we can't get this American movie here in America. Rather than drive myself crazy wondering why I can't get these movies and series from America-I just go ahead and buy them overseas. If you want to buy from overseas, the Amazon sites are set up identically to this one. All the buttons are the same. If you need something translated, just open a new window, google a translator of whatever language you are looking at to English, copy and paste what you need translated and hit enter. It was simple and basic. I have wanted this movie on DVD for years-now I have it. I watched it right away and loved it just as much as when I saw it years ago. If there is a movie or series you have been waiting for in DVD and can't get-try overseas with Amazon UK or Amazon Germany, there is even an Amazon Japan.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I always liked this movie growing up, but the price that has been placed on it by the one seller is ridiculous. I understand that the movie is out of print, but no one in their right mind is going to spend that much money on a movie. I'll just wait until it's released again and buy it for a REASONABLE price.

reviewText: I wish somebody would find out why it is that this particular title has not been released on DVD where it is not only easier to find, but also a good deal less expensive!  I have been trying to find this on DVD for as long as I can remember, why is this only available in other countries on DVD and not in the US?!  When are they going to finally get this out to boot?!
